description: In Notre-Dame On Fire, French film-maker Jean-Jacques Annaud depicts a theory related to the birds. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Could pigeons have been culprits behind 2019 Notre-Dame Cathedral fire?
title_page: Could pigeons have been culprits behind 2019 Notre-Dame Cathedral fire? | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE â€“ Where historical monuments exist in Europe, one will also find pigeons. Old buildings, with their wooden rafters, eaves and empty airspaces under roofs, make attractive nesting sites.
Could the birds have helped trigger the fire that in 2019 destroyed a portion of the Notre-Dame Cathedral in Paris?
